purchase-section.title: Protocol owned liquidity module
purchase-section.description:
Sell $t(common:asset.{{to}}) LP tokens directly to the protocol for a 12% premium.

 50% of the $t(common:asset.{{from}}) treasury rewards (earned from borrowing fees) are redirected to purchase these LP tokens which are locked forever, ensuring healthy ongoing liquidity for the protocol.

info.title: Buy $t(common:asset.{{from}}) with $t(common:asset.{{to}}) LP tokens
info.offered-price: The price $t(common:asset.{{to}}) finance is offering per LP token

purchase.title: Buy $t(common:asset.{{from}}) with $t(common:asset.{{to}}) LP tokens
purchase.info: The minimum buy amount is 1 $t(common:asset.{{from}}). This is currently {{price}} $t(common:asset.{{to}}).
purchase.source-label: How much $t(common:asset.{{from}}) do you want to buy?
